org.ensembl.datamodel
Class Query

java.lang.Object
  org.ensembl.datamodel.Query
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
Deprecated. since version 27.0

public class Query
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable

A query defines what to retrieve and how much to retrieve. What to retrieve means filter conditions and how much means whether children should be included. e.g. genes with or without exons.

See Also:
